Name: Lesley Longstone
Job/Team Function: The IPCC's Chief Executive is the IPCC's Accounting Officer and is accountable to the Home Office Principal Accounting Officer and to Parliament. She is responsible for running the organisation which supports the work of the Commission.

Name: Kevin Woodrow
Job/Team Function: The  Director of Resources is responsible for Finance, IT, HR, Estates  and Security for the organisation.

Name: David Knight
Job/Team Function: The Director of Operations is responsible for supporting the Chief Operating Officer in the execution of his duties.

Name: Mike Benbow
Job/Team Function: The Director of Hillsborough is responsible for overseeing all aspects of the IPCC's  investigation into the Hillsborough disaster

Name: Tim Bianek
Job/Team Function: The Director of Change is responsible for the directorate  planning for the expansion of the IPCC

Name: Kathie Cashell
Job/Team Function: The Director of Strategy and Impact is responsible for all aspects of the IPCC's external relations including press, policy, engagement and oversight of the police complaints system.

Name: Nick Hawkins
Job/Team Function: The Chief Operating Officer is responsible for all IPCC operational matters including casework and all forms of investigations.
